answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!Get your thyroid tested. Hyperthyroid states often cause these symptoms. Also rule out diabetes. Kidney disease should be assessed by kidney function test.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: For the last month i have been running a low grade fever that runs up to 100.8. My normal temp is 97.3 and for the last several years i have been running low grade fevers that stay between 98.6-99.2. In the last month the temp has been up and I have protein in the urine, although it is lower than last year. Last year it was in the 300's and this year in the 200's. I feel like i can't completely empty my bladder but a UTI has been ruled out. Any ideas on what else to do. I also get the worst case of night sweats, waking up soaked and feeling as if i need a shower and change night clothes.
title: FUO
